Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.builderportfolio.dao.UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends Object
DAO class for managing User data.

Maintains an in-memory mapping of User IDs to User objects. Provides methods to save, fetch, and check users. Thread-safe collection is used for concurrent access.

  • Method Details

    • saveUser

      public static void saveUser(User user)
      Saves a new user into the database. If the user ID already exists, it will overwrite the existing user.
      Parameters:
      user - User object to save

    • idExists

      public static boolean idExists(String userId)
      Checks whether a user ID already exists in the system.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID to check
      Returns:
      true if the user ID exists, false otherwise

    • emailExists

      public static boolean emailExists(String userEmail)
      Checks whether an email is already registered.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - Email to check
      Returns:
      true if the email exists, false otherwise

    • getUserById

      public static User getUserById(String userId)
      Retrieves a user's details using their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user to fetch
      Returns:
      User object if found, otherwise null

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clears all registered users from memory. Useful for resetting during tests.
